title: GiftWrap Etc. Blue Decorative Christmas Pillow Cover - 18" x 18", Let It Snow Pillowcase, Living Room Couch Decoration, Home Decor, Classroom, Office
features: 18" x 18" square Christmas decoration pillow case great for showing your warm and festive side to family and friends!
This Christmas themed Pillow Case has unique falling snowflakes and the Christmas wish "Let is Snow" in fun eye caching white text!
Ideal Winter and Christmas Decoration - Eye catching seasonal Christmas Decor you might keep around all year, just depends on how much you like snow?
Proudly display on your porch, patio, living room, couch, chairs, guest room and bed! Make guests feel invited to your home, Christmas Party, Winter Office Party and Santa's Toy Shop!
Add a festive touch inside your home, bedroom, bathroom, outside or in the office! These colorful and decorative Pillow Cases are sure show your friends and family your festive Christmas spirit!
description: Dreaming of a White Christmas? Unique falling white snowflakes adorn this 18" x 18" square Holiday Decoration Pillow Case. The Christmas wish "Let it Snow" decorates the pillow case in an eye catching white text. Proudly display this Christmas pillow case in your living room on your couch and chairs or in your room on your bed! Ideal for that Fall, Winter and Christmas Lover. This seasonal Christmas Pillow Case is a real gift for anywhere you call home!
